channel.title: Invisible character
channel.description: when ever i wield my custom weapons and armor with certain armor, my character becomes invisible, why is it doing this? and how can i fix it?

item.title: Invisible character
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

Here you off to the side it tells you what they are for.

if(i == 10000)//model ID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];//menu class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//menu option class8.anInt174 = 14000;//inventory/drop model class8.anInt181 = 2300;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 1535;//rotation 1 class8.anInt198 = 1778;//rotation 2 class8.anInt169 = 0;//model offset 1 class8.anInt194 = 0;//model offset 2 class8.anInt165 = 14001;//male wield ModelId class8.anInt200 = 14001;//female wield ModelId class8.anInt188 = -1;//female sleeve class8.anInt164 = -1;//male sleeve class8.aString170 = "Arcane Destroyer";//Thank Gary1988 for the fixed model's and int! class8.aByteArray178 = "Very powerfull Arcanian weapon!".getBytes();//name }

Read full topic

item.title: Invisible character
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

alright thanks, but im not familiar with inits to good, could you post and example of an init and tell me what each line does, ex.

if(i == 14910) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[3]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 960; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 912; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 22464; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 912; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 43968; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 912; class8.anInt174 = 14911; // [b]Drop Model[/b] class8.anInt181 = 720; class8.anInt190 = 0; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 0; class8.anInt165 = 14910; // [b]wield model[/b] class8.anInt200 = 14910; // [b]wield model[/b] class8.aString170 = "Cavalier Mask"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A combined black cav and highwayman mask".getBytes(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Invisible character
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

I am not very good with customs but i have made a few 50 put into my server and this is because your ints are off like the item is to large or something like that try abjusting your ints and seeing if that works.
